name: Don't let me fall (beta)
description:
CONTROLS 
Player 1                                                            Player 2  
W = Jump                                                             Up Arrow =Jump     
A &  D = Move                                                       Left & Right = Move 
               G = Hit                                                             numpad 5 = Hit                    
push your opponent to the water to win don't let your self fall or touch by the water
it's a game inspired by push me if you can.
there still so many bugs in the game and the character selection menu is not really working but you can play well if some thing wrong just restart the game thank you
  press F11 to full screen
if player 2 cant punch/hit press/on numlock and read the controls                
what do you think? is it good or bad? comment bellow thankyou!
